00042 class TTabItem {
00043 private:
00044   CWnd *m_pWnd;             // Window (view) associated with this tab
00045   CStatic *m_pCaption;      // Caption of this tab
00046   BOOL m_bWndEnabled;       // Is window enabled
00047   BOOL m_bEnabled;          // Is tab enabled
00048   BOOL m_bVisible;          // Is tab visible
00049   int m_nMinX;              // Client left X coordinate
00050   int m_nMaxX;              // Client right X coordinate
00051   HICON m_hIcon;            // Optional icon handle for tab
00052 
00053 public:
00054   TTabItem(CWnd *pParent, LPCTSTR label, HICON hIcon = NULL);
00055   TTabItem(const TTabItem& obj);
00056   TTabItem& operator=(const TTabItem& obj);
00057   virtual ~TTabItem();
00058   
00059   void SetRect(CRect& rect);
00060   void SetFont(CFont *pFont);
00061   void SetIcon(HICON hIcon);
00062 
00063   CString GetText(void);
00064   void SetText(LPCTSTR szLabel);
00065 
00066   void Enable(BOOL bEnable);
00067   void EnableTab(BOOL bEnable);
00068   void ShowTab(BOOL nShow);
00069   
00070   int GetLength(void);
00071   CWnd *GetSafeWnd(void);
00072 
00073   friend class TTabWnd;
00074 };

00192 class TVisualObject {
00193 public:
00194   enum TObjectStyle {
00195     TOS_TABTOP        = 0x00000001, // Tabs on top (tab window)
00196     TOS_TABBOTTOM     = 0x00000002, // Tabs on bottom (tab window)
00197     TOS_SELECTED      = 0x00000004  // This tab is active
00198   };
00199 
00200 private:
00201   enum TObjectType { 
00202     OT_UNKNOWN,
00203     OT_SPLITTER,                    // Splitter window
00204     OT_SPLITTERVIEW,                // View within a splitter window
00205     OT_SPLITTERSPLITTER,            // Nested splitter window
00206     OT_TAB,                         // Tab window
00207     OT_TABVIEW,                     // View within a tab window
00208     OT_VIEW,                        // Plain view
00209   };
00210   
00211 private:
00212   TObjectType m_nObjectType;
00213   DWORD m_dwId;                     // Unique identifier of this object
00214   CWnd *m_pWnd;                     // Window associated with this object
00215   CWnd *m_pParent;                  // Parent window
00216   CString m_strTitle;               // Title of this window
00217   CString m_strDescription;         // Optional description of this window
00218   int m_nRows;                      // Splitters: number of rows
00219   int m_nCols;                      // Splitters: number of columns
00220   int m_nRowIndex;                  // Splitter view: row index
00221   int m_nColIndex;                  // Splitter view: column index
00222   CCreateContext *m_pContext;       // Context 
00223   CRuntimeClass *m_pRuntimeClass;   // Class of this window
00224   CSize m_Size;                     // Splitter: initial size
00225   BOOL m_bEnabled;                  // Enable state
00226   DWORD m_dwStyle;                  // Additonal style (for tab window)
00227   CHAR m_cHotKey;                   // Optional hot key (for example, '2' for ALT+2)
00228   HICON m_hIcon;                    // Optional icon for tab
00229 
00230 private:
00231   TVisualObject *m_pOwner;          // Owner of this child (or NULL for root level)
00232   TVisualFramework *m_pFramework;   // Pointer to framework that owns this object
00233   TVisualObjectList m_ObjectList;   // Child object list
00234 
00235 private:
00236   TVisualObject();
00237   void zeroAll(void);
00238   void checkStyle(void);
00239 
00240 public:
00241   // Create a plain view
00242   TVisualObject(DWORD dwId, CCreateContext *pContext, 
00243                 CRuntimeClass *pClass);
00244   // Create a tab window or a view within a tab window
00245   TVisualObject(DWORD dwId, LPCTSTR szTitle, CCreateContext *pContext, 
00246                 CRuntimeClass *pClass, DWORD dwStyle = 0);
00247   // Create a splitter window
00248   TVisualObject(DWORD dwId, LPCTSTR szTitle, int nRows, int nCols, 
00249                 CCreateContext *pContext, DWORD dwStyle = 0); 
00250   // Create a nested splitter window
00251   TVisualObject(DWORD dwId, int nRow, int nCol, CCreateContext *pContext, 
00252                 CRuntimeClass *pClass, CSize size, DWORD dwStyle = 0);
00253   // Create a view within a splitter window
00254   TVisualObject(DWORD dwId, int nRow, int nCol, int nRows, int nCols, 
00255                 CCreateContext *pContext, DWORD dwStyle = 0); 
00256   TVisualObject(const TVisualObject& obj);
00257   virtual ~TVisualObject();
00258 
00259   TVisualObject& operator=(const TVisualObject& obj);
00260   void Destroy(BOOL bDestroyWindow = FALSE);
00261 
00262   BOOL CanFocus(void);
00263   void SetHotKey(CHAR cHotKey);
00264   void SetDescription(LPCTSTR szDesc);
00265   BOOL SetIcon(UINT nIconId);
00266   HICON GetIcon(void);
00267 
00268   BOOL SetActivePane(void);
00269   BOOL SetActiveTab(void);
00270 
00271   BOOL Enable(BOOL bEnable);
00272   BOOL EnableTab(BOOL bEnable);
00273   BOOL ShowTab(BOOL bShow);
00274 
00275   BOOL IsEnabled(BOOL& bEnabled);
00276   BOOL IsTabEnabled(BOOL& bEnabled);
00277   BOOL IsTabVisible(BOOL& bVisible);
00278 
00279   BOOL IsTabPane(void);
00280   BOOL IsTabWindow(void);
00281   BOOL IsSplitterPane(void);
00282   BOOL IsSplitterWindow(void);
00283   BOOL IsView(void);
00284 
00285   DWORD GetID(void);
00286   CWnd *GetWnd(void);
00287   CWnd *GetSafeWnd(void);
00288   CString GetTitle(void);
00289   CString GetDescription(void);
00290   CWnd *GetParentWnd(void);
00291   TVisualFramework *GetFramework(void);
00292   TVisualObject *GetOwner(void);
00293 
00294   friend class TVisualFramework;

00300 inline DWORD TVisualObject::GetID(void)
00301   { return m_dwId; }
00302 inline CWnd *TVisualObject::GetWnd(void)
00303   { return m_pWnd; }
00304 inline CWnd *TVisualObject::GetSafeWnd(void)
00305   { return ::IsWindow(m_pWnd->m_hWnd) ? m_pWnd : NULL;; }
00306 inline CString TVisualObject::GetTitle(void)
00307   { return m_strTitle; }
00308 inline CString TVisualObject::GetDescription(void)
00309   { return m_strDescription; }

00311   { return m_pParent; }
00312 inline TVisualFramework *TVisualObject::GetFramework(void)
00313   { return m_pFramework; }
00314 inline TVisualObject *TVisualObject::GetOwner(void)
00315   { return m_pOwner; }

00410 //=============================================================================
00411 // TVisualFrameworkIterator
00412 //
00413 // Iterates thru all visual objects in the framework (including objects that
00414 // cannot be focused like tab windows and splitters)
00415 //=============================================================================
00416 
00417 class TVisualFrameworkIterator {
00418 private:
00419   enum TIteratorType { IT_MAP, IT_LIST };
00420   TVisualObjectMap *m_pObjectMap;
00421   TVisualObjectMap::iterator m_MapIt;
00422   TVisualObjectList *m_pObjectList;
00423   TVisualObjectList::iterator m_ListIt;
00424   TIteratorType m_nType;
00425 
00426 public:
00427   TVisualFrameworkIterator(TVisualFramework& obj)
00428     :m_pObjectMap(&(obj.m_ObjectMap))
00429   {
00430     m_MapIt = m_pObjectMap->begin();
00431     m_nType = IT_MAP;
00432   }
00433   TVisualFrameworkIterator(TVisualObject& obj)
00434     :m_pObjectList(&(obj.m_ObjectList))
00435   {
00436     m_ListIt = m_pObjectList->begin();
00437     m_nType = IT_LIST;
00438   }
00439   TVisualObject *operator->()
00440   {
00441     return Get();
00442   }
00443   TVisualObject *Get(void)
00444   {
00445     switch (m_nType) {
00446     case IT_MAP: return m_MapIt->second;
00447     case IT_LIST: return *m_ListIt;
00448     }
00449     ASSERT(FALSE);
00450     return NULL;
00451   }
00452   int End(void)
00453   {
00454     switch (m_nType) {
00455     case IT_MAP: return (m_MapIt != m_pObjectMap->end()) ? 0 : 1; 
00456     case IT_LIST: return (m_ListIt != m_pObjectList->end()) ? 0 : 1;
00457     }
00458     ASSERT(FALSE);
00459     return 1;
00460   }
00461   int operator++(int)
00462   { 
00463     switch (m_nType) {
00464     case IT_MAP: m_MapIt++; break;
00465     case IT_LIST: m_ListIt++; break;
00466     default: ASSERT(FALSE);
00467     }
00468     return End();
00469   }
00470 };
